toggle.heading: Here are the best colleges in the U.S.

hero.title: Best National University Rankings
hero.description: Schools in the National Universities category, such as the University of Chicago and Carnegie Mellon University, offer a full range of undergraduate majors, plus master's and doctoral programs. These colleges also are committed to producing groundbreaking research.
hero.subtitle: Here are the best colleges in the U.S.

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Founded in 1971, Touro College is a private institution. Touro College follows a semester-based academic calendar and its admissions are considered selective.

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Located in central Connecticut, the University of Hartford is a private school where students value annual traditions. U of H students can participate in events such as the Spring Fling party and the Martin Luther King Jr. celebration or stay involved with clubs and Division I sports throughout the year.

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: At the University of Maine, students participate in annual events such as Maine Day, when the school hosts a parade, and then together, everyone helps clean the campus. Notable UMaine alumni include bestselling horror author Stephen King, who wrote "Carrie" and "The Green Mile."

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Founded in 1919, Western New England University is a private institution. Western New England University follows a semester-based academic calendar and its admissions are considered selective.

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: At Widener University in Chester, Pennsylvania, many students help the community by mentoring local children, building houses and donating blood. Notable Widener University alumni include esteemed film director Cecil B. DeMille.
Founded in 1933, Wilkes University is a private institution.

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Located in northwestern Pennsylvania, Gannon University upholds its Catholic mission through both the Campus Ministry and the Center for Social Concerns, which coordinates community service projects. Gannon students can also join Division II sports teams and Greek life.

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Founded in 1920, Immaculata University is a private institution. The school has 76.9% of its classes with fewer than 20 students, and the student-faculty ratio at Immaculata University is 10:1.
New Mexico State University has five locations, with the main campus situated in Las Cruces. NMSU is home to the Chile Pepper Institute, which promotes the state vegetable.

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Founded in 1877, Regis University is a private institution. Regis University follows a semester-based academic calendar and its admissions are considered selective.

utag_data.stitial_fact: The most popular fields of study for international students in the U.S. are business and management and engineering.
